amendment.description: To prohibit the transfer of amounts from the Veterans Choice Fund to fund the increase of the authorization to carry out the medical facility construction project of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Denver, Colorado.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2700 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S6956; text: CR S6956) To prohibit the transfer of amounts from the Veterans Choice Fund to fund the increase of the authorization to carry out the medical facility construction project of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Denver, Colorado.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2700 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Lee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
